content: need a market tote for day to day use from going to your favorite farmers market or to the beach make this cute tote with a solid bottom beautiful lace body and sturdy strap free pattern 1 diy lion brand kit 2 yarn + free pdf downlaod written in american standard terms materials 4 00 mm crochet hook 2 skeins of lion brand 24/7 cotton in jade 761-178c - color a in pattern 2 skeins of lion brand 24/7 cotton ecru 761-098c - color b in pattern #4 worsted weight yarn color a - 290 yards color b - 320 yards minimum 5 stitch markers skill level intermediate sizing one size - 15 across x 15 deep with 21 strap 1 https //lifeandyarn com/crochet-market-bag-free-pattern/ 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/6ydznq
